```
•	The end-to-end solution is PCI validated using Shift4’s i4Go, the industry’s most secure method for handling data.
```

```
So the reporting is the solution or will we have true access to the data or data feeds to import the data, etc.?
```
P&#8288;&#x200B;​&#x200B;&#8204;​&#8288;&#8205;﻿‍﻿﻿⁠‍‎‌&#x200B;&#8288;‌​&#8204;⁠&#8203;‍&#x200B;&#x200B;​​⁠​‌&#8204;⁠&#x200B;&#8288;​&#8205;﻿﻿&#8288;a⁠​&#x200B;&#8205;&#8204;‎​‍‍‍‌&#8206;​&#8206;﻿&#8204;&#8288;&#8206;‎&#8288;‎﻿g​‎&#8288;‍‎​&#x200B;&#8204;﻿﻿‎﻿⁠&#8204;&#8204;&#8288;‍&#x200B;&#8206;⁠‌&#8203;‎e⁠‍&#8203;​&#8204;‍⁠&#8206;&#x200B;&#8204;&#x200B;&#8288;‌﻿‎&#8288;&#8204;&#8288;⁠&#8206;&#8206;⁠&#8206;&#8203; 7&#8205;&#8204;‎&#8206;&#8204;​&#8206;﻿&#8205;​‌⁠﻿&#x200B;⁠‎&#x200B;⁠&#8288;&#8288;‎﻿&#8203;⁠‎&#8206;&#8288;&#8206;&#8204;&#8203;&#x200B;&#8206;‍‍⁠&#8288;&#8206;&#8288;⁠&#8205;&#8203;‌&#8206;‍&#8203;​&#8204;&#8205;‌&#x200B;3​&#8203;&#8206;‌&#8288;&#x200B;‍&#8205;&#8203;﻿﻿​‍&#8204;&#x200B;​&#8203;⁠&#8204;﻿​⁠﻿&#8205;&#x200B;&#8206;​
```
•	The end-to-end solution is PCI validated using Shift4's i4Go, the industry's most secure
method for handling data.

```
